bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Born in Germany, Hilde Marx (1911-1986) was a writer, poet, and journalist. She also put on a one woman show in the late 1960s and early 1970s. Hilde Marx also traveled to Rohde Island to take part in speaking engagements.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains numerous scrapbooks including correspondence, writings published in Aufbau (NY), programs from Hilde Marx's one woman shows, photographs, and ephemera. There are also match book covers of the places she stayed while traveling and, a Greyhound bus ticket showing when she traveled to Rohde Island. There are also newspaper clippings of small publications that she wrote in and there are two festival fliers as well.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is processed and it is arranged chronologically.
